Style: I prefer to see returns at the same level, unless it is a guard block (https://wiki.c2.com/?GuardClause).  Unexpected fall throughs I've seen lead to bugs.
Both ways to address this will duplicate the frontier gas price calculation, but from a readability perspective I think it's fine as it makes what is going on explicit.
This could be re-written as two guard blocks (one checking for 1559 enablement in general, then the two variables calculation, then the check for basefee being present) returning frontier prices and then a final return for 1559 prices.
